00055  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00056 
00057 const void * OCI_API OCI_HandleGetContext
00058 (
00059     OCI_Connection *con
00060 )
00061 {
00062     OCI_CHECK_PTR(OCI_IPC_CONNECTION, con, NULL);
00063 
00064     OCI_RESULT(TRUE);
00065 
00066     return con->cxt;
00067 }
